item.title: Untaxed vehicle left on road for 5 days not sure who's it is, 26th February
item.description:
Car has been parked there for 5 days. Noones come to fetch the vehicle. It untaxed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Gipsy Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Always litter on the street: cans, food wrappers, clothes - this pretty residential street is never clean, 26th February
item.description:
It's so tiresome that there is always litter scattering on this lovely street. Please increase thorough cleaning (when a car moves there are always cans and bottles left behind) and teach the community to look after their environment better.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Goulton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car abandoned after crash, 26th February
item.description:
Car crashed into traffic light, been left there. Absolute hazard, the traffic light is bent, can't see when crossing road. Needs to be removed ASAP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 26th February
item.description:
Dead tree on Ridley rd which was planted as part of the ridley rd upgrade; The tree is some sort of Fir tree which is evergreen, but this one is clearly dead and will cause damage when it falls and now looks really bad in the street scene.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ridley Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lockbox or storage box, 26th February
item.description:
These are either abandoned lockboxes or or for airbnbs. And none of the properties opposite these boxes allow any short term lets. Please remove them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Red Lion Court, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car left, blocking road works and gathering leaves, 26th February
item.description:
This car has not moved in a couple of years. It doesn’t have. Valid MOT despite still being taxed. It is being worked around in terms of road cleaning and painting. It needs shifting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sundridge Avenue, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excess litter at parking under railway arches and by adjacent bus stop, 26th February
item.description:
The stretch from Pembury Circus to HD. Overground Station feels like a neglected no man’s land. Litter is scattered along the parking bays under the arches & around the adjacent bus stop, where large dumpsters are left in unsanitary condition. Clean up pls

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Greenery in prison - or are we the residents fenced away from nature?, 26th February
item.description:
Along Dalston Ln. the greenery is open and welcoming, but as you approach Clarence Rd the fencing becomes increasingly aggressive. Rather than protecting anything, it locks away green space, traps litter and makes the street feel hostile. Pls remove them.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarence Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rusty white van reg KM11 NEF hasn’t moved for weeks. Abandoned?, 26th February
item.description:
Rusty white van reg KM11 NEF hasn't moved in 4 weeks. Neighbours are not aware of owner and none have been on holiday for that long.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Lacon Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of woodville Road and Brondesbury road, 26th February
item.description:
This metal bollard has been knocked over by a car and it’s caused a lot of damage to the pavement

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattress topper overflowing in bin on street, 26th February
item.description:
There is a dumped mattress topper overflowing in a bin that is sitting on the street and blocking the pavement on Tyler Street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tyler Street, Greenwich

item.title: Traffic light loose and swaying in the qind, 26th February
item.description:
Sonething is broken with the light as the "head" unit is swaying in the wind. Photo is taken going s/b on Southampton Row just before the junction. It's the light next to the sign in the photo

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southampton Row, Holborn, Greater London
